entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 8.4°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Low 6. Forecast issued 03:08 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 9. Forecast issued 03:08 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 03:08 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
